interface.name: wlproxy_sync_v1
interface.description:
This protocol can be used by wl-proxy applications to synchronize state between their own wayland client and the proxy.
Compositors should not implement this interface directly.

request.name: sync_with_proxy

description.summary: synchronize from the client to the proxy

request.description:
This request can be used to synchronize messages between the client and the proxy.
The id_hi and id_lo arguments form an opaque 64-bit number.

event.name: sync_with_client

description.summary: synchronize from the proxy to the client

event.description:
This event can be used to synchronize messages between the client and the proxy.
The id_hi and id_lo arguments form an opaque 64-bit number.
